page.title: 14MODEL RAILWAY CLUB,NEWPORT.
page.content: The Newport Model Railway Club meets at Beechwood House in Beechwood Park. The members have built a very large model railway which is powered by low voltage electricity (12v). The size of the model railway is 15m by 3.5m. and it is built on baseboards which can be seperated from one another so that the whole model canbe moved. All of the trackwork on the model has been built by the members from rail made from nickel silver soldered to sleepers cut from printed circuit board material. Many model trains run on the layout,which is called "Over Wellmyn". Some of them are models of old-fashionmed steam trains, but others are models of the latest trains seen on British Rail. The layout was on show at Newport Museum and Art Gallery recently.
